description:
The El Morro Fleece hoodie was designed for before and after your run. With a highly premium and comfortable double face fleece, it elevates perception for casual to performance.

The El Morro series is constructed from a Nylon Viscose Stretch double face fleece. This delivers the protective and functional performance of nylon with a premium and technical look and feel. Clean seam construction, minimal paneling, and taped bartacks deliver on the sleek performance aesthetic, while the weighted fabric with contoured hood, drop tail and YKK Vislon™ zip front add function to the hoodie. Hidden interior lower stow pockets are perfect to stash your wallet or phone away. Dipped tip drawcord and relfective elements finish the premium styling.

The El Morro Fleece Hoodie may not finds its way onto the trail with you but knowing its waiting at the finish line is a rewarding sentiment...comfort lies ahead.
name: Roark El Morro Fleece - Mens
